item.description:
Want to meet new playmates for your furry friend? Want to make new friends that love dogs as much as you? Come to the next Metrowest Small Dogs Meetup! It's fun and, best of all, it's FREE!

If you'd like to schedule a bath for your dog after the meetup, give Best Friends a call prior to the 10th and they'd be happy to arrange something for you! 508-881-3441


**Please bring proof of vaccinations at time of meetup! All dogs must be current on Rabies and Distemper vaccines.
item.name: Metrowest Small Dogs September Meetup
